p: The principal biological effects reported for this compound are related to its capability to modulate signaling pathways [ 191, 192], but the antiviral activity reported against poliovirus (PV) and enterovirus 71 (EV71) in RD cells (IC 50 of 2.7 SI: 63; IC 50: 2.0 SI: 85) was not related to c-Raf, B-Raf or IFN response [ 193].
